Name: Junebug vs. Evil
About the game: Junebug, a resourceful mountain man, has found himself under attack by the forces of evil. Equipped with a growing arsenal of weapons and supplies found around his cabin, he's ready to fight against evil, for as long as he can. The first night finds you almost unprepared and the longer you survive, the more you'll be equipped to destroy anything that lurks in the darkness. Each Death Brings New Terror The strange power that has cursed the land has also given you the power to come back from death, under certain circumstances. This gift comes at a cost though, as every death brings more enemies. Fast-Paced Action Find scrap, loot enemies, upgrade weapons, and fight until you can't. See how far you can survive!
